DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe FX Empty Face Paints Palettes (30 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
The Empty Face Paint Palette Case from Wolfe holds up to twelve 30 gram Wolfe FX Face Paints. The 30 gram containers which come in individual containers with screw tops fit snugly in a foam insert sized just right for them.
The Wolfe Empty Face Paint Palette Case is great for organizing your Wolfe Face Paints and for building a palette that you can take with you to jobs and events.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: The empty palette tray will hold 12 of the 30 gram size of Wolfe face paints
Great for storing your paints or for travel
Wolfe face paints are highly pigmented and dense with color
The palette case is a great way for you to organize your existing collection of Wolfe paints
